long_description: Easy to recharge via USB and easy to wrap on your handlebar, the Bison Designs ReCharger Bike Light delivers bright white or red LED light, in steady or strobe modes. Contains an integrated lithium-ion battery that recharges from your laptop or favorite USB outlet. Long-lasting LED light bulb is energy efficient and burns white or red, in steady or strobe mode. Loop wraps around your bike's handlebar or seat post and snaps into a groove that holds it securely in place. Bison Designs ReCharger Bike Light transfers quickly and easily from one bike to another. Fully recharges in 2 hrs.; battery life on high: 8 hrs.; battery life on strobe: 3.5 hrs.
